remarks: The only ideals in a division ring are the zero ideal and the unit ideal.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
statement:
divrngidl.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
divrngidl.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
divrngidl.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
divrngidl.4 $e |- Z = ( GId ` G ) $.
divrngidl $p |- ( R e. DivRingOps -> ( Idl ` R ) = { { Z } , X } ) $.
